name: Mirai Nodes
description: Mirai Nodes is develope a mobile app called Mirai Vault. It is a mobile application for Proof of Stake (POS) coin users, offering a comprehensive and user-friendly platform for staking, masternode sharing, and wallet functionalities. Mirai Vault is designed to enhance the POS experience with a focus on efficiency, security, and accessibility. Mirai Vault offering multinode system support with the lowest fees, integrated staking and masternode sharing, secure wallet functionalities, and a fair distribution model
